caption.p: Temporal changes with latitude in the difference in the number of annual WHWDs and THWDs over land under ( a) RCP2.6, ( b) RCP4.5, and ( c) RCP8.5. ( d) Mean air temperature and ( e) relative humidity under RCP8.5 were also simulated. Results are based on the multi-model averages during 2016â€“2095.
